They utilize X12 and EDI standards for billing and transactions as mentioned in their services overview.
The company focuses on secure health information management, which aligns with health-tech rails.
MATT BILLING offers integration services that facilitate compliance with HIPAA regulations and EDI standards for health transactions.

icp.icp_reason: The company specializes in X12 and EDI transactions, indicating strong relevance to target API use cases.
